idea:
August Assortments Private Limited specializes in dry fruit confectionery . Our focus is on using quality ingredients which have higher nutrition content. Our vision is to make world class confectionery without compromising on taste and quality. 


Our best product is Almond Brittle which is a caramel based product having over 30 % Roasted Californian Almonds. 


Our distribution is pan India via a network of Distributors and E-commerce Players. We also specialize in corporate gifting with a focus on customization .

idea:
For working professional, bachelors, college students and working women - planning, organizing and then executing a structured diet becomes cumbersome and hence unsustainable. The stress or choosing what to eat in every day meal and the monotony in the meals may lead you astray from your fitness goal. Most of the users end up eating unhealthy fast food / junk food as it is easily available and quick to grab. Further, The overload of information also does not help the process of making the right choices simpler. In the long run un healthy eating habits might affect the human body in long run and hence eating healthy food – all ingredients necessary to keep the body healthy is essential. We need to have right balance of Carbs, Protein, Vitamin and Calcium. We are providing subscription service wherein we provide regular meals – Roti (Beetroot, Bajri, Makai), SatvikSabji, Dal, Soup, Salad and brown rice. We also provide other healthy option which replaces the junk food – Brown Bread Sandwich. We provide 20 days different menu with no repeat of any item in the menu which provides the user a different menu from the daily mundane food. A sample menu is as follow:

Monday

Lunch: Grilled veggie and hummus wrap with sweet potato fries

Dinner: Chickpea curry with basmati rice

Tuesday

Lunch: Red lentil veggie burger with avocado salad

Dinner: Flatbread with grilled garden vegetables and pesto

In short in today’s fast and hectic lifestyle we are trying to bring in healthy food options. at consumers doorstep so that they don’t have to worry about the healthy lifestyle.

Consumer can select the menu as per the calorie intake required
name: EATFITGO FOOD PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Company profile

ImmunoAdoptive cell therapy private limited (ImmunoACT) was incorporated on 8th October,2019 by Dr. Rahul Purwar, Associate professor at IIT Bombay. The ImmunoAct was incubated by Society of Innovation and Entrepreneurship (SINE).

The Co-founders Alka Dwivedi and Atharva Karulkar are PhD scholars in IIT Bombay.

The mission of this company is to design and develop cell therapy products for immunotherapy at an affordable rate catering to the needs of the larger section of the society.

Our team has already developed the platform for engineered T cells (Chimeric Antigen Receptor T-cells,CAR-T) at IIT Bombay.

CAR-T cells are genetically modified autologous T-cells, with MHC-independent recognition of cancer antigen, leading to T-cell activation, proliferation and persistence. The CAR-T cell expresses a single chain variable fragment (scFv) on its surface directed against a particular antigen followed by the trans-membrane and co-stimulatory domains (CD28 or 4-1BB). Once the CAR recognizes and engages the specific antigen, it triggers activation of effector T-cells and destroys the target cells. The CAR-T cell therapy directed against CD19has shown significant clinical benefit.

The product and process are covered under IP in two Indian Patents and one PCT. The process developed earlier at IIT Bombay IP has been exclusively licensed to ImmunoACT Pvt. Ltd . The patent details are as follows:

1. MURINE ANTI-CD19 CHIMERIC ANTIGEN RECEPTOR AND ITS PREPARATION, Patent Application No.201821005457

2. NOVEL HUMANIZED ANTI-CD19 CHIMERIC ANTIGEN RECEPTOR, ITS NUCELIC ACID SEQUENCE AND ITS PREPARATION, PCT/IN2019/050111, Patent Application No 201821005458

3. INDUCIBLE CYTOKINE COMPOSITIONS AND METHODS FOR IMMUNOTHERAPY APPLICATIONS (Provisional Patent application filed.)
name: IMMUNOADOPTIVE CELL THERAPY PRIVATE LIMITED
